controlMappings.rationale: OWASP ZAP performs dynamic application security testing to identify runtime vulnerabilities
controlMappings.evidence: Active and passive scanning for security flaws in running applications

controlMappings.rationale: OWASP ZAP provides comprehensive vulnerability scanning of web applications
controlMappings.evidence: Automated scanning with detailed vulnerability reports and risk ratings

controlMappings.rationale: OWASP ZAP detects error handling issues through fuzzing and payload injection
controlMappings.evidence: Identifies verbose error messages and stack trace disclosure

controlMappings.rationale: OWASP ZAP checks for transmission security issues like SSL/TLS misconfigurations
controlMappings.evidence: Detects weak ciphers, certificate issues, and insecure protocols
